name: Last Train ride
description:
After celebrating her promotion with her friends a tipsy Reeby drives back home alone with her car.

She stops her car to avoid an accident and takes a train wtih no passenger inside.

Where to play?:

Firefox

Other Browser: Press F12 and refresh. Dont close.

Wo kann man es spielen?:

Firefox

Andere Browser (Google Chrome; Opera; Internet Explorer etc.): Klicke F12 (Laptop fn und F12 gleichzeitig klicken) und neu laden. Nicht Fenster schließen.
